thread.section_title: France Eiffel Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: 24th Feb - 28th Feb
thread.title_full: 24th Feb - 28th Feb - Review of France Eiffel Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: sor67
title: 24th Feb - 28th Feb
text: Stayed for 3 nights last weekend. Location great, staff very helpful, room was bigger then expected by Paris standards this would have been my third time in Paris. Really enjoyed our stay would definitely stay again. Cannot fault the hotel what so ever. Hotel receptionist was very helpful in planning our trip to Disney land and our return to the airport.
